name: WindPath
description:
This is game is a school project carried out in 2021-2022.  It's a racing game boat, with wind management and bonuses of all kinds. 

HOW TO PLAY

You can play this game single-player or two-player local multiplayer.

Align the orange arrow corresponding to the direction of the sail with the blue arrow, the direction of the wind.

You can interact with barrels to get bonuses

Speed boost 

Change wind direction 

Shooting at other boats

CONTROL

1 - KEYBOARD

directional arrow to steer the boat,
A and E to orient the sail
Z to use a bonus
SPACE to switch to rear camera

2-  XBOX CONTROLLER

A to move forward,
Left joystick to steer the boat,
Lt / Rt to steer the sail
X to use a bonus
Click right joystick rear camera

CREDIT
